# ScentWise
> AI-powered fragrance advisor with 75,000+ perfumes. Discover your perfect scent through personality-based matching.

## About
ScentWise is an AI fragrance advisor that helps users discover their perfect scent through six unique discovery modes. It analyzes your personality — zodiac sign, music taste, fashion style, photos, and conversational cues — to match you with fragrances from a database of over 75,000 perfumes.

## Features
- AI Chat Advisor: Conversational fragrance recommendations with tasting notes, pricing, and alternatives
- Zodiac Fragrance Match: Birthday-based scent matching aligned with celestial profiles
- Photo Style Scan: Upload photos for aesthetic-based fragrance matching
- Music to Fragrance Match: Translate music taste into scent preferences
- Style Match: Fashion-to-fragrance personality matching
- Celebrity Fragrance Collections: Explore what icons wear — David Beckham, Rihanna, Cristiano Ronaldo, Ariana Grande, LeBron James, Zendaya, Drake

## Stats
- 75,000+ fragrances in database
- 6 discovery modes
- 2,500 curated top picks
- $2.99/month premium (3 free AI queries)
